languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс плотно сжимает губы, бросая взгляд на один из пыточных аппаратов, но хранит молчание.{/n}
{n}Heinrix's mouth flattens into a hard, thin line as he glances at one of the torture devices, but he remains silent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс плотно сжимает губы, бросая взгляд на один из пыточных аппаратов, но хранит молчание.{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希将嘴抿成了一条冷硬的细线。他朝其中一件刑具瞥了一眼，但什么都没有说。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's mouth flattens into a hard, thin line as he glances at one of the torture devices, but he remains silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希将嘴抿成了一条冷硬的细线。他朝其中一件刑具瞥了一眼，但什么都没有说。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは拷問器具のひとつを見て口をキュッと一文字に結ぶが、それでも何も言わない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's mouth flattens into a hard, thin line as he glances at one of the torture devices, but he remains silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは拷問器具のひとつを見て口をキュッと一文字に結ぶが、それでも何も言わない。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix aprieta los labios al contemplar uno de los instrumentos de tortura, pero no dice nada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's mouth flattens into a hard, thin line as he glances at one of the torture devices, but he remains silent.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' Mund formt sich zu einer einzelnen dünnen Linie beim Anblick eines der Foltergeräte, aber er sagt nichts.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İşkence aletlerinden birine göz atan Heinrix, dudaklarını oynatsa da tek bir kelime etmiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's mouth flattens into a hard, thin line as he glances at one of the torture devices, but he remains silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İşkence aletlerinden birine göz atan Heinrix, dudakları sıkı sıkıya kapalı ince bir çizgiye dönüşse de tek bir kelime etmiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
